thread.title: Very nice location, clean, and staffs are very friendly
thread.title_full: Very nice location, clean, and staffs are very friendly - Review of Ibis London Euston St Pancras, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: HJ9576
title: Very nice location, clean, and staffs are very friendly
text:
Highly recommend this hotel to everyone who is going to visit London. Nice location and friendly staffs. The room and bathroom are clean and neat. Short walking distance to train stations and shops
Will stay here again
(I'd definitely choose ibis or other Accor group hotels comparing to privately owned small hotels after a very bad experience in Paris)
